alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:02PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 445 PM MST... At 401 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary as well as clusters of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Pleasant to near Scottsdale to near Fountain Hills. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Glendale, Scottsdale, Tempe, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Youngtown, Waddell, Laveen, Sun City, Wittmann, New River, Sun City West, Cave Creek and Carefree. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 136 and 157. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 235. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
